name: Triceps Extensions on Cable With Bar
how_to_perform:
1. Stand facing away from the cable machine with the bar at chest height.
2. Hold the bar with an overhand grip that is wider than shoulder-width, keeping your arms straight and your elbows locked at the sides.
3. Engage your core by drawing your belly button towards your spine, ensuring proper posture.
4. Lower the bar to a position where it is behind your back, extending your triceps fully.
5. Pause briefly at the bottom of the movement.
6. Slowly raise the bar upwards using only your triceps by squeezing them against the resistance, keeping your core engaged throughout the exercise.
short_summary: Triceps extensions on cable with bar are an isolation exercise for the triceps muscles that target both heads
